Originally working in hypercomputation theory, his current research mainly concerns Logical Foundations of Relativity Theories and Isabelle/HOL verification of related theorems. Research interests Dr Stannett is interested in many areas of research, including Unconventional Computing and First-Order Logical Foundations of Physics.
